results.title: Could metformin be therapeutically useful in Huntington's disease?
results.text_hl: Emerging evidence suggest that dimethylbiguanide (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@), a first-line drug for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@, could be neuroprotective in a range of @DISEASE_Fractures_Spontaneous @DISEASE_MESH:D005598 @@@brain pathologies@@@, which include @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001930 @@@brain injury@@@.
